content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help schedule your HVAC service. Could I please have your name?
Hi, this is Linda. I need my AC looked at.
Thank you, Linda. Can you please provide your address so I can check if we service your location?
Thanks. Let me check your service area now.
I'm sorry, I’m having trouble verifying your address in our service area system. I will escalate this issue to our team for further assistance. Someone will get back to you soon.
reason: Service area calculation failed and requires human intervention
